outputs.output_descr: Support and advise the MEC on the development of policy regulations, codes of conduct and MoUs (or similar instrument) with other government agencies.

1. Assist in the prioritization, support and monitoring of the MECs Strategic Plan for 2012-2017.
2. To support tthe MEC through technical advisors to deliver technical assistance in operations and logistics, ICT, CVE and  procurement for elections.

1. Procurement of  essential international goods and services to complement the use of MEC national resources and participation of meetings to support structured stakeholder engagement, including with election observers.

Effectively and Efficiently manage the MECS project, Recruit international SEA and staff to support implementation according to the approved work plan;  Regular Project Board meetings; Monitoring, evaluation and reporting; Audits; Project assurance.

project_descr: Support to 2014 Tripartite Elections to foster democratic governance participation
